Hi there! I am a climate researcher interested in understanding climate change impacts on biogeochemical and their links to human systems.
I am currently an SNSF _Ambizione Fellow_ leading the subgroup _PanArcN_ at University of Bern. I am hosted by the GECO and Institute of Geography of University of Bern.
